content:
Is there documentation or examples on how to run a hello-world reflex-frp app using haskell-flake?

Optimally it would be cool to have Android, IOS and Web builds, but even just Web would be helpful.

None that I'm aware of.

But as someone who used Obelisk in the past this would certainly be useful to have as a demo.

Related to this, on my list of things to do is to create a template for https://haskell-miso.org/ based on haskell-flake.
